nodes.text: The R4-Salvatron was a large salvage droid that worked in the Barasin Refuse Yards on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. Similar in design to the X2H-8 Overseer Droid, the R4-Salvatron was destroyed by Imperial forces.

The R4-Salvatron appears as an enemy in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Defeating it is the final stage the bonus mission "Some Disassembly Required," which takes place in the Barasin Refuse Yards in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
